title: I had my Pixel 3 set to allow my son's diabetes "follow" app to sound through my Do Not Disturb.
content: I had my Pixel 3 set to allow my son's diabetes "follow" app to sound through my Do Not Disturb. I had to reset the app and cannot figure out how to allow it to override the Do not Disturb again. He has overnight lows that need attention
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
